entry.summary: Snow showers are expected to affect the road for a time during Monday morning. 1 to 2 cm may accumulate near the summit with lesser amounts down to 800 metres.

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Showers are expected to turn to snow overnight tonight, then clear around midday Monday. 4 to 8 cm may accumulate near the summit, with lesser amounts down to 700 metres.

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Northwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Winds easing from the south this evening and tonight. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Low. Changes: Chance of upgrade to Warning is now low.
